para.text: Any person who damages, destroys, or removes a vehicle boot without authorization of the Mayor shall be subject to a civil fine of no less than $900.
The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this section.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 6032 of Fiscal Year 2023 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-470, July 13, 2022, 69 DCR 008707).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 6092 of Fiscal Year 2025 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2024 (D.C. Act 25-506, July 15, 2024, 71 DCR 8406).
